title: Marc: 还未测试的地图非常少
author: zx728925
txt_content:
本帖最后由 bobby825 于 2016-9-9 21:58 编辑 

Marc：After all the training, team-building, weekend, streaming, etc, it feels like I'm finally back at work. Wait, today is meetings day!
Marc：在所有训练、团队建设、周末、分职位......后，感觉像我终于回到工作中了。等等，今天是会议日！
Marc：The map testing backlog is super low right now. Anything left is a promising map that needs more playing. Excited for the possibilities!
Marc：此时还未测试的地图非常少了。现在的事情是一张有前途的地图需要更多玩家的玩耍。为这个可能性兴奋吧！
